name: Obanai
description: A Telegram bot for anime and manga fans

BOT_TOKEN.description: The token for your Telegram bot

API_ID.description: The API ID for your Telegram bot

API_HASH.description: The API hash for your Telegram bot

DB_URI.description: The URI for your MongoDB database

DB_NAME.description: The name of your MongoDB database

OWNER_ID.description: The Telegram user ID of the bot owner

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: The Telegram group ID for user support

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: The Telegram chat ID for message dumping

PREFIX_HANDLER.description: The prefix for your bot's commands

DEV_USERS.description: Comma-separated list of Telegram user IDs for developers

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: The Telegram channel ID for bot updates

SUDO_USERS.description: Comma-separated list of Telegram user IDs for sudo users

WHITELIST_USERS.description: Comma-separated list of Telegram user IDs for whitelisted users

GENIUS_API.description: The API key for the Genius lyrics API

WORKERS.description: The number of worker processes to use

ENV.description: The environment to run the bot in (prod, dev, test)
